about-me.paragraph-1: Welcome! I am Rodolfo Salas, a full-stack JavaScript developer.
about-me.paragraph-2: I have 5 years of experience in front-end development, working with Angular, JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, and NextJS. I am also skilled in Tailwind CSS, SpartanNG, Shadcn, HTML, and CSS, creating modern, fast, and intuitive interfaces.
about-me.paragraph-3: Beyond front-end, I have experience with NestJS, AWS, version control using Git (GitLab/GitHub), and collaboration with Kubernetes, APIGEE, ServiceNow, CloudBees, Jira, Confluence, OpenShift, Grafana, and Shield.
about-me.paragraph-4: Currently, I am a Front-End Tech Lead at Banco PAN, and I have worked at major companies such as Accenture and Santander. I enjoy challenges that drive professional growth and bring innovative solutions to web development.
about-me.paragraph-5: ðŸ‡ªðŸ‡¸ I am in the process of obtaining Spanish citizenship, which will allow me greater flexibility for job opportunities in Spain and Europe.
